description: GALATIC is a CUDA template library for performing Sparse Matrix - Sparse Matrix multiplication (SpGEMM) over arbitrary semirings on the GPU. This work generalizes AC-SpGEMM, a modern GPU accelerated SpGEMM implementation that supports single and double-precision floating-point formats.
name: GALATIC: GPU Accelerated Sparse Matrix Multiplication over Arbitrary Semirings (GALATIC) v1.0
